Name: Lancer
Description:
Anti-infantry specialist that deals area damage with each attack with a Shadowguard riding it. Can be upgraded to use Blink

Can attack ground and air units.

Root.Tooltip: Orders selected units to move to the target area or follow the target unit. Moving units will not engage enemies.
Root.Name: Move

Root.Tooltip: Orders selected units to cancel all orders and stop moving.
Root.Name: Stop

Root.Tooltip: Orders selected units to stay where they are and attack enemies that are within range. Units will neither chase down enemies nor move to engage.
Root.Name: Hold Position

Root.Tooltip: Orders selected units to patrol between their current position and the target area. Units will attack enemies and move to engage nearby enemies.
Root.Name: Patrol

Root.Tooltip: Orders selected units to move to the target point, fighting nearby enemies along the way. Targeting a unit with the Attack command orders that it be attacked until it is destroyed.
Root.Name: Attack

Root.Tooltip: Orders selected units to move to the target area or follow the target unit. Scan-moving units will not engage enemies.
Root.Name: Scan Move

Root.Tooltip: The Battlecat unleashes a deadly field of electricity each time it attacks. Deals 20 damage.
Root.Name: Lightning Field

Root.Tooltip: Orders selected units to holster their weapons and avoid engaging enemies, unless given a direct command. Units holding fire will flee if attacked.
Root.Name: Hold Fire

Root.Tooltip: Calls down a Nuclear Strike at a target location. Nukes take 20 to land, but they deal up to 300 (+200 vs. structures) damage in a large radius.
Root.Name: Tac Nuke Strike

Root.Tooltip: Orders selected units to fire at will. They will engage enemy units within range and chase them as normal.
Root.Name: Weapons Free

Root.Tooltip:
A careful shot, dealing 150 damage. Ignores armor.

Can only target psionic.
Root.Name: Sniper Psi-Round

Root.Tooltip: Targeted unit is stunned for 8 seconds (3 seconds against heroic units).
Root.Name: Lockdown

Root.Tooltip: Teleports the Battlecat to a nearby target location.
Root.Name: Blink

Root.Tooltip:
The units will charge the enemies.

Click to make it only use ranged weapons.
Root.Name: Charge Enemies

Root.Tooltip:
The unit attack enemies with ranged weapon only.

Click to make it charge enemies.
Root.Name: Stay at Range
